## hpr2190 :: fucking botnets how do they work?

 
you can download the files, which includes the video tutorial on my hidden website: https://qzc3ou3vccr3yjyg.onion/software/gs-bot.tar.gz | you need the tor browser to do so


otherwise the video can be found on mediagoblin (minetest quality tho):
https://roaming-initiative.com/mediagoblin/u/spaceman1/m/how-to-make-a-gnu-social-bot/
